overview: It is the 1948 War of Independence. Lolek, a young Holocaust survivor, arrives in israel and is thrown in the middle of the desert. A stranger to the language and the new identity he is giver, Lolek is assigned to an isolated post under a brutal commander and the burning sun. with the unrelenting sun and the bleak desert landscape as the backdrop, we are exposed to a modern parable of Israeli identity and meaning.
title: Homeland
